title: Remembering James Foley, A Journalist Who Made His Life In War Zones
teaser: American James Foley, who was executed by Islamist militants, had been working for GlobalPost when he disappeared in 2012. GlobalPost CEO Phil Balboni speaks about about Foley and his work.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
